page.title: 14A Typical Day in my Life
page.content: 1 GROUP EFFORT. Most mornings I get up between 7.30 and 8.00a.m. and after I help my mum with the breakfast we all sit down to eat and watch Breakfast T.V. until its time for me to go to school. I start school at 9.00a.m. and we work till 12.00 with a quarter of an hour break for play. I have a school dinner but some of my friends bring sandwiches. We work for another two hours in the afternoon and leave school at 3.00p.m. Some of us go home by bus or car while a few walk. After I have done my homework I watch the children's programmes on T.V. before sitting down to an evening meal. Before I go to bed I enjoy doing some of my hobbies which include playing the piano, going to cubs or using my micro computer. I always take a book to read before I go to sleep.
